remarks: The meet of a subspace and an incomparable atom is the zero subspace. ( ~ atnssm0 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lsatnle.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatnle.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lsatnle.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatnle.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatnle.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lsatnle.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
lsatnle $p |- ( ph -> ( -. Q C_ U <-> ( U i^i Q ) = { .0. } ) ) $.
